title: -SERVER LAG- RIOT- PLEASE-READ Server lag in placement games
body:
So, I was just playing my last placement game i was 7-2 at the time everything was going well until everyone in the game started disconnecting, we were about to end the game and win, we all dc'd and then ended up losing 20 mins later.... Has this happened to anyone else the past hour or two???

Pls loss prevent this riot
